KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Name of the [multisource](../multisource) entity that (temporary) disables this {{ entname }}. If master is specified the {{ entname }} will be disabled and will not work. When [multisource](../multisource) entity is triggered/being triggering by all possible inputs, the {{ entname }} will work again. When [multisource](../multisource) lost at least one input signal, the entities becomes disabled again.
If set to 'Yes', monsters like cockroaches can trigger this entity as well as other monsters.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: If set, monsters can trigger this but only works when monster is moving within trigger.
If set, players won't be able to trigger this.
If set, [func_pushable](../func_pushable) entities can trigger this.
If set, everything other than monsters, clients and pushables can trigger this. Does not exclude the above.
Not applicable on {{ entname }}- it's already get triggered on enter!
If set, {{ entname }} will trigger as soon as something that entered it left it, instead of the instant something enters it.
